about_the_game:
Dear Explorers:

Prepare yourself as a new journey awaits! The boundaries of exploration continue to expand: Discover all the wonders of the sea and build an underwater base with the all new Vacuum Compartment! Continue the fight against the Cobalt Aliens who now control an army in the mysterious Cobalt Star Battlefield! Defend the ARK and reap great rewards! Modify and enchant equipment to become a legendary Explorer in Pixark.




Underwater Structures






  • You will be able to build your own unique and hidden underwater base with the new Vacuum Compartment and Vacuum Compartment Moonpool.
● Start an adventure underwater with your own unique style
● Connect compartments to build any way you want underwater!
● Place nearly 200 different kinds of furniture within your underwater base.

ARK Defending





  • The greedy Cobalt Aliens have started some trouble once again. Bring your most powerful creatures to defend the ARK and fight against the monsters controlled by the Cobalt Aliens to obtain great rewards.
● Three new challenges: Magic Island, Ice and Fire Island, and Cobalt Alien Battlefield
● Bring your best partners and fight against waves of monsters and aliens.
● Obtain awesome loot: Blueprints, brand new Equipment Sets, Equipment modifications and more!
ARK Defending Portal may be crafted at Exquisite Architectural Hut after activating Wonder in Water DLC on STEAM for free.

Equipment Modification and Enchantment






  • Gear yourself up! Modify and enchant your equipment to prepare for tougher fights!
● Firearm Worktable has been upgraded to Equipment Modification Station
● Modify your equipment for stat boost and a brand new appearance.
● Enchant your equipment and unlock new stats

Dear Explorers:

Prepare yourself as a new journey awaits! The boundaries of exploration continue to expand: Discover all the wonders of the sea and build an underwater base with the all new Vacuum Compartment! Continue the fight against the Cobalt Aliens who now control an army in the mysterious Cobalt Star Battlefield! Defend the ARK and reap great rewards! Modify and enchant equipment to become a legendary Explorer in Pixark.




Underwater Structures






  • You will be able to build your own unique and hidden underwater base with the new Vacuum Compartment and Vacuum Compartment Moonpool.
● Start an adventure underwater with your own unique style

  • The greedy Cobalt Aliens have started some trouble once again. Bring your most powerful creatures to defend the ARK and fight against the monsters controlled by the Cobalt Aliens to obtain great rewards.
● Three new challenges: Magic Island, Ice and Fire Island, and Cobalt Alien Battlefield
● Bring your best partners and fight against waves of monsters and aliens.
● Obtain awesome loot: Blueprints, brand new Equipment Sets, Equipment modifications and more!
ARK Defending Portal may be crafted at Exquisite Architectural Hut after activating Wonder in Water DLC on STEAM for free.

name: PixARK - Wonder in Water - Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
